lead_paragraph: NATTMAN--Gertrude S.,91, passed away from cancer on February 22, 2016. Retired psychotherapist with MSW from Columbia University. Devoted wife to the late Nathan Nattman. Survived by sons Ford H. and Steven C. Weisberg, daughter-in-law Nancy, grandchildren Alexander, Nathaniel and Joseph, and cousins and nephews from the Novzen and Krepisman families. Loved theater, music, and, above all, family. Burial at The Kensico Cemetery, Sharon Gardens, Lakeview Avenue, Valhalla, NY on Friday, February 26, 2016 at 9:30am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NATTMAN, GERTRUDE S.
